title: Get 200 pieces of Halloween candy for $12 or 400 pieces for $23
text:
Click here to read the full article.

October is here, which mean Halloween is just around the corner — and if you ask us, the scariest thing about Halloween is the prospect of overpaying for candy. Instead of waiting for the last minute yet again this year and spending an arm and a leg for candy at a local store, why not take care of things early and save some money? Amazon is running a great sale right now that gets you a SKITTLES, STARBURST, and HUBBA BUBBA Gum Halloween Candy Bag with 200 pieces for just $11.99, and you can also get a MARS Chocolate Favorites Halloween Candy Bars Variety Mix Bag with 400 pieces for only $22.98! The MARS bag includes TWIX, MILKY WAY, SNICKERS, 3 MUSKETEERS, M&M’s, so your house will definitely be the talk of the town this Halloween.

200-Piece Halloween Candy Bag

Contains one (1) 82.98-Ounce 200 piece Fun Size bag of SKITTLES, STARBURST, and HUBBA BUBBA Gum

This 200-piece bulk candy pack includes Fun Size SKITTLES Original, Wild Berry, and Sours flavors, STARBURST Original, and HUBBA BUBBA Bubble Gum

A mix of bite-size, chewy, fruity candies with a colorful candy shell, juicy fruit chews, and bubble gum

Perfect for Halloween parties, trick-or-treating, or to share in your candy bowl

Three favorite candies and gum in one bag

400-Piece Halloween Candy Bag

Contains one (1) 126.3-ounce 400-piece bag of MARS Chocolate Favorites Halloween Candy Bars Variety Mix

Enjoy fun size chocolate candy bars from your favorite TWIX, MILKY WAY, SNICKERS, 3 MUSKETEERS, M&M’S Brands

Pass out these fun-sized bags to trick-or-treaters at Halloween

Individually wrapped to share with friends, family, the office, party guests or trick-or-treaters

Spread the Halloween spirit: BOO your friends and neighbors with a surprise chocolate treat
